column3:
“FLOWER Review of LBS's Bananas 

PERFECTLY BALANCED HYBRID !!!

Offers a very EUPHORIC and FUN MIND & BODY HIGH ! 
with no noticeable uncomfortableness 

Use ANYTIME on days off &
AFTER WORK on days you work
Not recommended as a wake and bake because it is very relaxing and you won't want to work LMAO. 

Most Hybrids claim a 50/50 I/S or close % and allege it will help with muscle relaxation via it's Indica side but ...”

“This was - like all his products - very very nice;) The smell was unreal, straight bananas. The taste is very sharp at first and spicy but rolls around to the smell and the flavor of great tasting herb- made me very happy. This wasn't as dry as the other strain and ground up to some fokkin beauty!”

“Snoop does it again!
Dense buds with skunky and fruity smell 
Does not smell like Bananas 

The buds are pointy like Bananas.
Lots of Trichomes 
Yummy”

“This strain is fairly complex, the inhale definitely has hints of tropical banana while the exhale has hints of ammonia. Don't smoke to much thinking it's not working.. this strain will creep on you fast, especially when you get up to go get the Cheetos.”
“Definitely an indica strain, I don’t mind at all! Helps me sleep very well and keeps the pain under control:)”
“Great hybrid well balanced. Bought a 1/4 of this stuff and took it to a party it was hit. 5 stars without a doubt.”

“The high is a Creeper, taste good and is a great night cap. I was asking myself if I thought I was medicated and then BAM, my spaceship rocket boosters were half way down to the ocean bed. It's bananas son!”
“this strain is very tasty  awesome trycones and always fresh from nature's   AZ medicine gives you a nice body high  I would suggest  for daytime use”

“The high is a Creeper, taste good and is a great night cap. I was asking myself if I thought I was medicated and then BAM, my spaceship rocket boosters were half way down to the ocean bed. It's bananas son!”
“Actually feel high off small amount. Doesn’t help with headache. Causes mild anxiety, but likely just because of strength.”
“I got a Pre-roll of banana split from Nature's Medicine. it was decent. Couldn't really taste my hits. took the whole thing to get the effect. not a favorite but I'd try it again.”
“this strain is very tasty  awesome trycones and always fresh from nature's   AZ medicine gives you a nice body high  I would suggest  for daytime use”

“very good for stress reliever and very very strong aroma it's a hybrid but it more stony like a indica I love it and the flavor profile is very fruity I think I heard some other people say otherwise”

“I really enjoy the full-body relaxation I get from this strain. I have muscle spasms and TMJ syndrome and I felt like my muscles were slowly melting into butter. I felt clear-headed but a bit paranoid with major cotton mouth. I would recommend as a bedtime strain.”
“Works great for pain and gives energy to get through the day. Not much appetite with this.”

“🗣 Superb 💯  This Baby Is What Medical Marijuana Smells Like! Great For PTSD, Anxiety, and Chronic Pain. Releasing 📡 A Light Euphoric☺️Feeling While Balancing The Mild Body Relaxation 🏆  
🍃MYK”
“Good but not as good as Willie's”

“Im reviewing this bananas and cream crumble from tru|med" in Phoenix and it is truly truly dank. Honestly one of the 20 best concentrates I have ever used in my life. The high is klean enough to remain funktional with a high level of fokus. At the same time something for the end of the day to relax
column5: etc.... Truly an all around great strain. A definite must try.”"

column3: “Tastes good smokes good 💨💨👍🏾👍🏾”

“I got the Pure Vape disposable pen in the flavor Banana Smoothie and it was awesome! I haven't gotten high in forever, so I was a little paranoid at first. This strain legit taste like banana's which I wasn't really expecting. I asked the budtender if she's had these before and she said yes and that it won't give you much of a cough. This was all true! The only thing is to be careful how much you take in if you're a ...”
“helps nausea alot”
“It tastes like bananas and is very smooth.”

“smells like bananas 
heavy shit”
“Favorite.  Perfect high. Happy silly and relaxed.”
“Happy and euphoric high, once it creeps up on you. Citrus/fruity flavor. High THC, congratulations Snoop.”
“Very impressed. Might have found a new favorite here. Great smell, great taste, pleasant experience. Made me feel relaxed and happy. No negative effects at all for me. Will be buying again soon.”

“This strain was nice. It gave me the giggles and left me happy and in a good mood. Overall this strain is perfect for gathering even though is didn't taste like bananas or anything it still hits hard (in a good way).”
